{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Ft-air-one-f-s.png |image1_size = 150px |caption = N300 Wireless Single Band FastEthernet Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://fibertool.ru/catalog/active/wifi_marshrutizatory/besprovodnoy_marshrutizator_ft_air_one_f |ppalt = (RU) |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Fibertool_FT-AIR-ONE-F |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Fibertool |model = FT-AIR |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = -ONE-F |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = N300 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7620N; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24KEc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 580 <!-- 580 / 600 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = SPI |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;W25Q128JVSIQ; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = EtronTech;EM6AB160TSD-5G; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = A0:22:4E:C |oui = A0:22:4E:C
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;3.4.113;Wive-NG-HQ;
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = <!-- Number of USB Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = Admin |defaultpass = Admin |defaultssid = Wive-NG-HQ |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Wive-NG
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 03/2020 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Future support available with {{TPFirmware|Wive-NG}} :[[Wive-NG]] • [https://wi-cat.ru/wive-ng/who-is-wive-ng/ ''Wive-NG'' on '''Wi-CAT'''] (RU)
The bootloader used is assumed to be '''U-Boot'''. :Default SSIDs Wive-NG-HQ.
===Specifications=== *CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7620N @580MHz WiSoC *Flash: 16MB (SPI); RAM: 64MB (DDR) *WLAN: [[MediaTek]] MT7620N (2T2R 2.4GHz) :Wi-Fi: 802.11bgn (2.4GHz)/20dBm (100mW) <!-- only 2.4GHz --> :Antenna: 2x 5dBi (external) *Ports: 1x 100M WAN, 4x 100М LAN *FW: Wive-NG-HQ
==Links of Interest== ===Models=== *[[Fibertool FT-AIR-DUO-G]] (AC1300) • [https://fibertool.ru/catalog/active/wifi_marshrutizatory/besprovodnoy_marshrutizator_ft_air_duo_g/ PPage] :CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7621AT @880MHz (Dual Core) :Flash: 16MB (SPI); RAM: 256MB (DDR3) :WLAN: [[MediaTek]] MT7615DN (2x 2T2R 2.4/5GHz) :FEM: [[Skyworks]] [https://www.skyworksinc.com/en/Products/Front-end-Modules/SKY85303-21 SKY85303-21] / [https://www.skyworksinc.com/en/Products/Front-end-Modules/SKY85746-11 SKY85746-11] :Wi-Fi: 802.11bgn (2.4GHz)/20dBm (100mW) :802.11an/ac Wave2 (5GHz)/23dBm (200mW) :Antenna: 4x 5dBi (external) :Ports: 1x GbE WAN, 4x GbE LAN :USB: 1x USB 3.0 (power off/on) :FW: Wive-NG-HQ
*[[Fibertool FT-AIR-DUO-F]] (AC1200) • [https://fibertool.ru/catalog/active/wifi_marshrutizatory/besprovodnoy_marshrutizator_ft_air_duo_f/ PPage] :CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7620DA @580MHz WiSoC :Flash: 16MB (SPI); RAM: 64MB (DDR2 int.) :WLAN: [[MediaTek]] MT7613AEN (2T2R 5GHz) :Wi-Fi: 802.11bgn (2.4GHz)/20dBm (100mW) :802.11an/ac Wave2 (5GHz)/23dBm (200mW) :Ports: 1x 100M WAN, 4x 100М LAN :Antenna: 4x 5dBi (external) :FW: Wive-NG-HQ
